name: Tales from the crypto - ED.1 - Gonz
description: first art of the '' Tales from the crypto '' collection, idealized and produced by me, emerged from ideas hidden from me, in order to put out feelings and emotions, good and bad through subliminal messages, understand if you can ...! In this pilot art we have a collab with johana, a longtime friend of mine, in her photography I used 3D techniques, involving distortions of wireframes in their format, and the use of collages and letters of my own Visual language that I am very fond of producing! 2
